name: Smith and Winston
description: Mash together explosive combat with Metroidvania style exploration, sprinkle in total level destruction and bingo you have Smith and Winston a fun new take on the twin stick shooter genre.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5 GHz (or equivalent) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 5xx DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 2.8GHz  (or equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1050GTX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
